mapper.update: update tf_product set DELETE_YN = 'Y' where PRD_REG_SEQ = ${prdRegSeq}; update tf_stock set DELETE_YN = 'Y' where TF_PRD_CD = (select TF_PRD_CD from tf_product where PRD_REG_SEQ = ${prdRegSeq})
mapper.select: select * from (select * from tf_product where DELETE_YN = 'N') tp inner join tf_stock ts on tp.tf_prd_cd = ts.tf_prd_cd where ts.TF_PRD_BARCODE = #{barcode} limit 1

select ts.TF_PRD_NM as name, PRD_SIZE as size, TF_PRD_BARCODE as barcode, tp.BRAND_KIND_CD as brand from (select * from tf_product where DELETE_YN = 'N') tp inner join tf_stock ts on tp.tf_prd_cd = ts.tf_prd_cd where EC_PRD_CD = #{item} group by TF_PRD_BARCODE
select count(*) from TF_PRODUCT WHERE TF_PRD_CD = #{tfPrdCd}
